sections.MISSION: A TROOP, 1/2 CR conducts Pre EIB and Advanced Rifle Marksmanship Training on 17 May 23 on Range 102 IOT train and qualify Soldiers on the M4 weapon system and prepare Soldiers for the upcoming EIB .
sections.PURPOSE: – In order to produce Soldiers that are qualified on the M4 weapon system in preparation for the upcoming EIB training.
sections.KEY TASKS:
–
Train Lethal Soldiers
Build Confidence in assigned weapon system
To serve as a potential opportunity to qualify for the EIB M4 requirement
sections.END STATE:
– All of the Troop’s Soldiers qualified on M4 weapon system, improving TRP/SQDN lethality. Troop Commander and Platoon Leaders are presented with list of qualified soldiers.

sections.EXECUTION:
PLTs will conduct round-robin Tables I-III days prior to range. On day of range troop moves to RG 102 assembles in AA. Firers move dismounted to holding area at RG 102, receive range and safety brief, receive ammo at 102.
Tables IV-VI will be conducted NOV 20.
Table IV will be conducted in two parts, the group/zero and the known distance confirmation on Ranges 102. Lanes on range 102 will transition to Table V when it is deemed there are enough Soldiers to start Table V. We will make the transition to Table VI when appropriate.
C I – AMA, Water Internal to PLT.
C IV – Sandbags through Range Control.
C V – Ammunition coordinated by XO.
Task to Subordinate Units-
HQ – Provide overall C2 support and Coordinate field rations.
1st PLT – 3x Safeties, Table III
2nd PLT - 3x Safeties, 6x fire detail, Table I
3rd PLT – 2x Safeties, 1x OIC, 1xRSO, 1xRTO, 1x Ammo NCO, 2x Soldiers for ammo detail, Medical Support, 2x Gate Guards Table II
